casebody.data:
No. 11-262. Virgil D. “Gus” Reichle, Jr., et al., Petitioners v. Steven Howards. 565 U.S. 1078, 132 S. Ct. 815,

181 L. Ed. 2d 525,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 8820. December 5, 2011.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Tenth Circuit granted.

Justice Kagan took no part in the consideration or decision of this petition.

Same case below, 634 F.3d 1131.
